attachments.title: Remembering Dementia
attachments.text:
Final MA animation film.

All the work showcased in the film was completed by myself as part of my animation masters degree.
Initial character design was completed by Rebecca Oliver (fellow masters student) in 2D before being converted to 3D.

Characters featured in the film are all real people speaking of real experiences with dementia. The audio is taking directly from unscripted interviews conducted by myself.

Logos at the beginning of the film are for example purposes only. This film has not been made in association with any of the charities/organisations featured during the title shot.
attachments.video_html: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/358766294?autoplay=1&app_id=122963" width="400" height="225" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen title="Remembering Dementia"></iframe>

text:
Hi Alan, I hope you're good. Sorry I've dropped out of touch again but it's been the final big push for my film.

It's all done now, I'd love to get your thoughts on it
